sentences.sContent: One possible interpretation is that they want you to resign.
sentences.sCn: 一种可能的解释是，他们想要你辞职。

sentences.sContent: It’s difficult to put an accurate interpretation on (= explain ) the survey results.
sentences.sCn: 对调查结果难以作出确切的解释。

sentences.sContent: What exactly the author meant by that statement is open to interpretation (= able to be understood or explained in different ways ).
sentences.sCn: 作者这句话的确切含义可有各种理解。

sentences.sContent: ...Sara offered her interpretation of the survey results...
...The Phoenix, in Mid-Levels, offers the widest interpretation of "British cuisine"...

words.tran: 可说明的；可判断的；可翻译的

trans.tranOther: the way in which someone explains or understands an event, information, someone’s actions etc
